translation.en: but I can bash through with this Octo-mech suit.
translation.vi: but I can bash throughwith this Octo-mech suit.

translation.en: This shaft will take us back up to the Z-One.
translation.vi: This shaft will take usback up to the Z-One.

translation.en: Can you fix it? We gotta let the others know we're okay.
translation.vi: Can you fix it?We gotta let the others know we're okay.

translation.en: There might be a way to reboot it from here.
translation.vi: There might be a wayto reboot it from here.

translation.en: Actually, I was hoping for an emergency carrot.
translation.vi: Actually, I was hopingfor an emergency carrot.

translation.en: Welcome back to a very special installment of the Octonauts video training series,
translation.vi: Welcome back to a very special installmentof the Octonauts video training series,

translation.en: Everyone knows the sound of a sardine burp,
translation.vi: Everyone knowsthe sound of a sardine burp,

translation.en: but many other species of fish are known to burp as well.
translation.vi: but many other species of fishare known to burp as well.

translation.en: We're fine, Cap, but what's going on out there?
translation.vi: We're fine, Cap,but what's going on out there?

translation.en: which involves a massive chain of eruptions all around the Ring of Fire.
translation.vi: which involves a massive chainof eruptions all around the Ring of Fire.

translation.en: The Ring of Fire! So that's what caused the tsunami wave.
translation.vi: The Ring of Fire!So that's what caused the tsunami wave.

translation.en: It's caused major problems all over the Pacific Ocean.
translation.vi: It's caused major problemsall over the Pacific Ocean.

translation.en: Most of the eruptions are dying down, but there's still one more on the way,
translation.vi: Most of the eruptions are dying down,but there's still one more on the way,

translation.en: Looks like a big old undersea volcano off the coast of Japan.
translation.vi: Looks like a big old undersea volcanooff the coast of Japan.

translation.en: That volcano must be home to all kinds of sea creatures.
translation.vi: That volcano must be hometo all kinds of sea creatures.

translation.en: Aye! But how are we all going to get there in time?
translation.vi: Aye! But how are we allgoing to get there in time?

translation.en: It'll take days to fix the repair station and dig out all the GUPs.
translation.vi: It'll take days to fix the repair stationand dig out all the GUPs.

translation.en: And the Z-GUPs aren't exactly the speediest.
translation.vi: And the Z-GUPsaren't exactly the speediest.

translation.en: Y'all remember that Z button I told you not to press?
translation.vi: Y'all remember that Z buttonI told you not to press?

translation.en: Okay, everyone, prepare for transformation.
translation.vi: Okay, everyone,prepare for transformation.

translation.en: -Shiver me whiskers. -Oh wow!
translation.vi: -Shiver me whiskers.-Oh wow!

translation.en: It should have everything we need to deal with that last volcano.
translation.vi: It should have everything we needto deal with that last volcano.

translation.en: Looks like you modeled it after the vent shrimp.
translation.vi: Looks like you modeled itafter the vent shrimp.

translation.en: They can withstand the hottest temperatures on Earth.
translation.vi: They can withstandthe hottest temperatures on Earth.

translation.en: Like a vent shrimp, the Mega GUP-Z is heatproof,
translation.vi: Like a vent shrimp,the Mega GUP-Z is heatproof,

translation.en: and it's perfect for scooping up sea critters.
translation.vi: and it's perfectfor scooping up sea critters.

translation.en: Thanks, Cap! Ready to take the driver's seat?
translation.vi: Thanks, Cap!Ready to take the driver's seat?

translation.en: -Ready. -Activating Z-Seat swap.
translation.vi: -Ready.-Activating Z-Seat swap.

translation.en: It's gonna take all of us working together to operate it.
translation.vi: It's gonna take all of usworking together to operate it.

translation.en: And it's completely covered with sea creatures.
translation.vi: And it's completely coveredwith sea creatures.

translation.en: Dashi, how much time do we have before it erupts?
translation.vi: Dashi, how much timedo we have before it erupts?

translation.en: The lava's building up inside the volcano, and when it reaches the top…
translation.vi: The lava's building up inside the volcano,and when it reaches the top…

translation.en: Then we've got to get all the creatures away from here before that happens.
translation.vi: Then we've got to get all the creaturesaway from here before that happens.

translation.en: Attention, sea creatures! This volcano is about to erupt.
translation.vi: Attention, sea creatures!This volcano is about to erupt.

translation.en: If you can swim away, you should do so immediately.
translation.vi: If you can swim away,you should do so immediately.

translation.en: Everyone else, sit tight. The Octonauts are coming to the rescue.
translation.vi: Everyone else, sit tight.The Octonauts are coming to the rescue.

translation.en: Scans show the volcano is clear of creatures, Captain.
translation.vi: Scans show the volcano isclear of creatures, Captain.

translation.en: Captain, we've got to clear out of here ourselves.
translation.vi: Captain, we've got to clear outof here ourselves.

translation.en: -Yeah! -Oh me, oh my!
translation.vi: -Yeah!-Oh me, oh my!

translation.en: They're just swimming around in there without a care in the world.
translation.vi: They're just swimming around in therewithout a care in the world.

translation.en: Though it is feeling warmer than usual today.
translation.vi: Though it isfeeling warmer than usual today.

translation.en: There's one more thing the Mega GUP-Z can do,
translation.vi: There's one more thingthe Mega GUP-Z can do,

translation.en: Trouble is, I've never tested it. Never even made a button for it.
translation.vi: Trouble is, I've never tested it.Never even made a button for it.

translation.en: I see you already got the hang of the spear claw, Kwazii.
translation.vi: I see you already got the hangof the spear claw, Kwazii.

translation.en: In mantis shrimp mode, we can spear and hammer the rocks away.
translation.vi: In mantis shrimp mode,we can spear and hammer the rocks away.

translation.en: That's how we've got to do this, as a team!
translation.vi: That's how we've got to do this,as a team!

translation.en: When our power runs out, the five Z-GUPs will all blast apart.
translation.vi: When our power runs out,the five Z-GUPs will all blast apart.

translation.en: Sure is. How about some super heat shields?
translation.vi: Sure is.How about some super heat shields?

translation.en: The creatures are just on the other side of this lava.
translation.vi: The creatures are juston the other side of this lava.

translation.en: -All clear. -Thanks.
translation.vi: -All clear.-Thanks.

translation.en: -Thank you! -Thanks, Mister!
translation.vi: -Thank you!-Thanks, Mister!

translation.en: -Cap! -Uh-oh!
translation.vi: -Cap!-Uh-oh!

translation.en: The power warning! We're running out of time.
translation.vi: The power warning!We're running out of time.

translation.en: -Up there, on that rock. -Help us!
translation.vi: -Up there, on that rock.-Help us!

translation.en: It feels like this whole place is about to blow!
translation.vi: It feels like this whole placeis about to blow!

translation.en: Cap, we're almost out of mantis shrimp power!
translation.vi: Cap, we're almost outof mantis shrimp power!

translation.en: We won't make it out of the volcano in time.
translation.vi: We won't make it outof the volcano in time.

translation.en: Time's up. We're blasting apart in ten, nine…
translation.vi: Time's up.We're blasting apart in ten, nine…

translation.en: -Six, five… -Gotcha!
translation.vi: -Six, five…-Gotcha!

translation.en: I really didn't do much. Just returning the favor.
translation.vi: I really didn't do much.Just returning the favor.

translation.en: What is it, Professor? Have all the eruptions stopped?
translation.vi: What is it, Professor?Have all the eruptions stopped?

translation.en: Don't worry, Dashi. The Octopod is heading to you.
translation.vi: Don't worry, Dashi.The Octopod is heading to you.

translation.en: It looks like that little eggy took a real beating.
translation.vi: It looks like that little eggytook a real beating.

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
translation.vi: -Thank you.-You're welcome.

translation.en: But where are all these penguins going to live now?
translation.vi: But where are all these penguinsgoing to live now?

translation.en: After all, their island was destroyed, right?
translation.vi: After all, their islandwas destroyed, right?

translation.en: I think the Ring of Fire might provide us with a solution.
translation.vi: I think the Ring of Firemight provide us with a solution.

translation.en: Volcanic eruptions can destroy things, but they can also create things.
translation.vi: Volcanic eruptions can destroy things,but they can also create things.

translation.en: Tunip, this island's perfect for the chinstrap penguins.
translation.vi: Tunip, this island's perfectfor the chinstrap penguins.

translation.en: But it's not on any of our maps. How did you know it was here?
translation.vi: But it's not on any of our maps.How did you know it was here?

translation.en: Come on, Octonauts. Now that we're all back together again,
translation.vi: Come on, Octonauts.Now that we're all back together again,

translation.en: it looks like we've got some seaweed to plant.
translation.vi: it looks like we've gotsome seaweed to plant.

translation.en: You know, Cap, even though we were apart today,
translation.vi: You know, Cap,even though we were apart today,

translation.en: it still felt like we were all working as a team.
translation.vi: it still felt like we wereall working as a team.

translation.en: Yeah. It was almost like you were right there with us, Captain.
translation.vi: Yeah. It was almost like you wereright there with us, Captain.

translation.en: You really, really need to update those training videos.
translation.vi: You really, really need to updatethose training videos.
